item.title: Important Properties in Rust
item.author: Author
item.description: 1.mutable & immutable & Shadowing & const 2.Statements & Expressions & Rust is expression-based language. 3.let ..if.. 4.loop label & break/continue expression/loop label 5.for..in.. 6.unit type(()) 7.Ownership Ownership Rules Each value in Rust has a variable that’s called its owner. There can only be one owner at a time. When the owner goes out of scope, the value will be dropped. move & clone & copy(Copy trait) 元组返
